ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringgcl.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ringgcl.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 | 1 | #P_rngogrpo | |- ( R e. RingOps -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_grpolcan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( C G A ) = ( C G B ) <-> A = B ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( C G A ) = ( C G B ) <-> A = B ) ) |
